plot outline: Kasinadhan is a martial arts expert who runs an Ayurvedic health clinic. His brother Swaminadhan is a patriarch, who keeps multinational businesses out of his village, to the dismay of politician Shankar Das and Gounder. Swaminadhan dies mysteriously, leaving Kasi investigate, and eventually take his place as the new patriarch.
title: Thandavam
plot: Brothers Kasinathan and Swaminathan strive for the good of their village. But after Swaminathan dies mysteriously, Kasi investigates and eventually take his place as the new patriarch.

Kasinadhan is a martial arts expert who runs an Ayurvedic health clinic. Swaminadhan dies mysteriously, leaving Kasi investigate, and eventually take his place as the new patriarch.::Anonymous
